title.rendered: 9 Strategies to Reduce Friction and Increase Sales You Can Implement Today

content.rendered:
In this webinar with Jameson Lochhead from Viabill and Sleeknote’s Rikke Thomsen you’ll get concrete strategies to reduce friction in the buyer’s journey and generate more sales. We’ll also take a look at how to win back lost cart revenue.

In This Webinar You Will Learn

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • Concrete examples for how to optimize your product pages efficiently
  • How to take advantage of empty carts
  • An easy but creative way to increase basket size
  • How to convert “window shoppers”
  • How to increase transactions in checkout–on both desktop and mobile
